entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 2:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times mixed with wet snow before morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm except 25 cm near the mountains. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
